## Options type

Configures server behaviour.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type Options = {
    root: string;
    regex: RegExp[];
    cover?: string | null;
    width: number | null;
    build: "html" | "jsx";
    cache: CacheOptions | null;
    fetch: FetchOptions;
    encode: EncodeOptions;
    plugins: Plugin[];
};
```
